jobs.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Architected frontend systems for PrismConnect using React + Tailwind, establishing reusable UI components and scalable design patterns for Web Dashboard.
Built real-time operational dashboards using Firestore listeners and WebSockets to track technician locations, equipment allocation, and Gantt-based project timelines.
Delivered the Commissioning & Handover Module with multi-step checklists, geo-verification, image validation, and mobile-optimized workflows.
Developed modular data visualization components for SLA performance, predictive maintenance, and asset monitoring.
Integrated with microservices across Estimation, Logistics, and Commissioning, ensuring resilient API interaction, optimized caching, and smooth synchronization across SQL/NoSQL data layers.
Collaborated with design, product, and backend leads to translate business workflows into efficient, maintainable UI flows.

jobs.title: Software Engineer - L2
description: Owned the architecture and development of UI modules for a SaaS workflow platform, delivering clean, maintainable, and scalable code.
Built a Kanban board system using DnD Kit for intuitive, high-performance drag-and-drop workflows.
Implemented interactive UI flows and reusable component libraries in React to enhance accessibility and responsiveness.
Designed and rolled out micro-frontend architecture (Module Federation) enabling independent deployments and improved scalability.
Integrated React-Mentions and Camunda DMN modeller, expanding the platform's automation and decision intelligence capabilities.
Mentored junior developers, improved code quality processes, and led FE knowledge-sharing initiatives.

jobs.title: Frontend Developer
description: Modernized consumer-facing Web/mWeb experiences to improve speed, consistency, and conversions.
Built reusable TDD-driven React components with CSS Modules for large-scale UI consistency.
Led migration from multi-page flows to a Single Page Application, improving customer engagement by 20%.
Partnered with UX, backend, and QA teams to deliver features rapidly while maintaining high engineering standards.

jobs.title: Frontend Developer
description: Developed UI components for healthcare analytics products using React, ensuring strong performance and responsiveness.
Supported Agile Scrum teams with regular sprint deliverables and stakeholder demos.
Standardized landing page design frameworks, improving brand consistency and reusability.
Conducted code reviews, maintained UI quality, and collaborated closely with designers.

about.heading: Hi! My name is Aliya Sayed
about.subheading: I'm a senior software engineer based in India and UAE
about.whatsappMessage: Hi, I'd like to get in touch with you to discuss a project or collaboration.
about.aboutContent:
Senior Software Engineer (Frontend) with 7.5+ years of experience building high-impact, scalable web applications using JavaScript, React.js, HTML5, and CSS.

Currently driving frontend innovation at PrismTech.ae, I specialize in crafting intuitive user interfaces and seamless user experiences with ReactJS and modern JavaScript frameworks. I have a proven track record of optimizing performance, enhancing workflows, and mentoring junior engineers to elevate team productivity. I thrive in fast-paced environments, consistently delivering polished solutions under tight deadlines.

My journey includes impactful stints at Acko, Furlenco, and Sigtuple, where I led frontend efforts across consumer and enterprise products. My tech toolkit includes React.js, Redux, TypeScript, SPA architecture, SCSS, Webpack, Node.js, Python, and robust testing frameworks.

Passionate about clean, scalable design systems and collaborative development, I'm always looking to build digital products that truly resonate with users.

Let's connect and build meaningful digital experiences together!
